image.title: Xiaomi 14 Ultra MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater

item.title: MIUI OS2.0.6.0.VNAMIXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi 14 Ultra Global
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi 14 Ultra Global

Codename: aurora

Version: OS2.0.6.0.VNAMIXM | 15.0

Size: 8.9 GB

MD5: b6a30d2b53d3c2f0e48160344e5f8c80

Changelog:
[System]
Fix: Occasional app crashes during app startup
Updated the security patch to December 2024. Increased system security.
[Status bar, Notification shade]
Fix: Notifications weren't displayed correctly in some cases

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI OS2.0.102.0.VNAEUXM Recovery update for Xiaomi 14 Ultra EEA
item.description:
New Stable Recovery update available!

Device: Xiaomi 14 Ultra EEA

Codename: aurora

Version: OS2.0.102.0.VNAEUXM | 15.0

Size: 7.0 GB

MD5: c1108f3476f240013ad39cf08350438c

Changelog:
[System animations]
New: During the process of opening or closing apps, the full screen indicator follows the window's movement
New: When quickly opening and closing apps, multiple app animations are displayed simultaneously
[Home screen]
New: After turning off the Home screen search bar, a 4×6 layout option becomes available
[Control center]
New: Flashlight brightness adjustment page
New: Certain devices now support adjustable flashlight brightness
New: Notification spotlight for flashlight
[Recents]
Fix: Recents couldn't be cleared in some cases
[Game speed booster]
New: Game Turbo performance dashboard
Optimization: Game Turbo interface improvements

Download: Here

Incremental Update: Here

item.title: MIUI OS1.0.7.0.UNACNXM Recovery update for Xiaomi 14 Ultra China
item.description:
New Stable Beta Recovery update available!

Device: Xiaomi 14 Ultra China

Codename: aurora

Version: OS1.0.7.0.UNACNXM | 14.0

Size: 7.3 GB

MD5: 81a48e3c208123ca078eb9e7b9ac9368

Changelog:
[System]
New: Camera grip charging options
New: Vital signs info can be included in messages sent via Tiantong Satellite communications (works with Mi Fitness 3.27.2 or later)
New: Emergency SMS can be sent automatically during satellite calls when Emergency SOS is on
Optimization: Touchscreen experience
[Camera]
Optimization: HDR image quality in some scenes
Optimization: Portrait mode image clarity
Optimization: Face brightness algorithms for average exposure metering option

Download: Here
